text:
In the following case:

Table with header and footer
table-omit-header-at-break="true"
Only one big cell that must be broken into pages

On page 2 and 3 of rendered PDF, the table footer overflows region-body without
warnings.

See attached FO.
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

text: I tried this with FOP 0.95 and it looks fixed.  The table footer remains in blue area which is region body.
creator: levinson@intersystems.com

text:
